questions.text: Now, I am going to ask you a general question. Please tell me about an advertisement that you recently saw in the Chinese newspaper or on Chinese television. What did you like or not like about the ad, and why?
questions.instructions: If the respondent answers 'I don't know', 'I have no idea', or gives an answer of ten words or less, or cannot clearly verbalize their thoughts, terminate; otherwise recruit.

questions.text: We would like to invite you to participate in a group discussion. We would like to hear your opinions and reactions to an anti-smoking advertising campaign. As part of their community service, this opinions. We will not be trying to sell you anything. The discussion will last approximately two hours.

details.location: The discussion will take place on
details.invitation: for your time and opinions. Will you be able to join us?

response_options.yes: Yes (FILL IN INFORMATION BOX AT TOP OF FIRST PAGE)
